original_title: Dem abruptly leaves press call after being informed she is committing felony | Fox News
article_summary: Texas Democratic Rep. Nicole Collier abruptly left a call with California Gov. Gavin Newsom and other Democrats after being told she was committing a felony for participating in the meeting from a state Capitol bathroom, during a debate on a redistricting bill. The call was part of a discussion on redistricting efforts, which Democrats in Texas have been resisting due to concerns about violating the Voting Rights Act.</s>
